column2: kable(table, caption = "Fall 2020 SEL Survey Respondents' Home Language", col.names = c("Home Language", "Percent (Total)"))%>% kable_styling(full_width = T, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "responsive"), position = "left", fixed_thead = T) %>% row_spec(c(13), bold = T, color = "#049E64")
